have used AR in the past with no issues and very easy implementation - it always just worked and was bomb proof. Not it seems to me unstable and fragile. cant save a record...
Unable to load type 'NHibernate.ByteCode.Castle.ProxyFactoryFactory' during configuration of proxy factory class. Possible causes are: - The NHibernate.Bytecode provider assembly was not deployed. - The typeName used to initialize the 'proxyfactory.factory_class' property of the session-factory section is not well formed.
i have read all the blogs and yes ahve tried targeting different cpus...first time i ever had to do thatin dot net. I had to down grade some other 3rd part dlls to do this....still nothing fixed it. As is i am gunna haveto drop AR as it appear to be unstable now...thoughts ?

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text:
Darin please use our users mailing list to discuss issues you have having. This is our issue tracker.
Please include a copy of your activerecord configuration and the version numbers of NHibernate.dll and NHibernate.ByteCode.Castle.dll you are using.
